resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107359</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107359</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206153</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Investigating the Climate System: Clouds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachforschen des Klima-Systems: Wolken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Investigation du système de climat : 
Nuages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Investigando o sistema do clima: Nuvens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studio del sistema di clima: Nubi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα του συστήματος κλίματος: Σύννεφα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Investigar el sistema del clima: Nubes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">casts students as interns in a state climatology office. Their assignment: to investigate how clouds form, how they're classified, and their role in heating and cooling the earth. This 30-page guide also helps students understand why clouds (and the study of them) are important.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formkursteilnehmer wie interniert in einem 
Zustandklimatologiebüro. Ihre Anweisung: nachforschen, 
wie Wolken sich bilden, wie sie eingestuft werden, und ihre Rolle in 
der Heizung und im Abkühlen der Masse. Diese Anleitung 30-page 
hilft auch Kursteilnehmern, zu verstehen, warum Wolken (und die Studie
von ihnen) wichtig sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étudiants de fontes comme interne dans un bureau 
de climatologie d'état. Leur affectation : pour étudier 
comment les nuages forment, comment ils sont classifiés, et leur 
rôle le chauffage et en refroidissant la terre. Ce guide 
30-page aide également des étudiants à comprendre pourquoi les 
nuages (et l'étude d'eux) sont importants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estudantes dos moldes como interna em um 
escritório do climatology do estado. Sua atribuição: 
para investigar como as nuvens dão forma, como são 
classificadas, e seu papel no heating e em refrigerar a terra. 
Esta guia 30-page ajuda também a estudantes compreender porque 
as nuvens (e o estudo deles) são importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">allievi dei getti come interna in un ufficio di 
climatologia di dichiarare. La loro assegnazione: per 
studiare come le nubi formano, come sono classificate ed il loro ruolo
nel heating e nel raffreddamento della terra. Questa guida 
30-page egualmente aiuta gli allievi a capire perchè le nubi (e lo 
studio di loro) sono importanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πετά τους σπουδαστές ως οικότροφους σε ένα γραφείο 
κρατικής κλιματολογίας. Η ανάθεσή τους: για να 
ερευνήσει πώς τα σύννεφα διαμορφώνουν, πώς είναι ταξινομημένα, 
και ο ρόλος τους στη θέρμανση και την ψύξη της γης. Αυτός ο 
οδηγός 30-σελίδων βοηθά επίσης τους σπουδαστές να καταλάβουν 
γιατί τα σύννεφα (και η μελέτη τους) είναι σημαντικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estudiantes de los moldes como interna en una 
oficina de la climatología del estado. Su asignación: 
para investigar cómo las nubes forman, cómo se clasifican, y 
su papel en la calefacción y refrescar la tierra. Esta guía 
30-page también ayuda a estudiantes a entender porqué las nubes (y 
el estudio de ellos) son importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206153</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107359</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/investigating-the-climate-system-clouds</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
